title: Colors 2021

metadata.description: Learn about Colors 2021 with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Every year the
Pantone Color Institute
evaluates the colors shown by fashion designers at the New York Fashion Week.
This information is used to create The Pantone Color of the Year and the 
Pantone Fashion Color Report with the top fashion colors for the year:
Colors of the Year 2021
Illuminating
HEX: #F5DF4D
PANTONE 13-0647
Ultimate Gray
HEX: #939597
PANTONE 17-5104
Spring / Summer Colors 2021
Marigold
HEX: #FDAC53
PANTONE 14-1050
Cerulean
HEX: #9BB7D4
PANTONE 15-4020
Rust
HEX: #B55A30
PANTONE 18-1248
Illuminating
HEX: #F5DF4D
PANTONE 13-0647
French Blue
HEX: #0072B5
PANTONE 18-4140

PANTONE 16-1529
Mint
HEX: #00A170
PANTONE 13-0117
Amethyst Orchid
HEX: #926AA6
PANTONE 17-3628
Raspberry Sorbet
HEX: #D2386C
PANTONE

Inkwell
HEX: #363945
PANTONE 19-4016
Ultimate Gray

PANTONE 11-0110

PANTONE 14-1127
Willow

PANTONE 16-0632

HEX: #005B88
PANTONE 18-4434

PANTONE 13-0647

Classic Autumn / Winter Colors 2021

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this c feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

summary: This tutorial covers Colors 2021 concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Colors 2021 effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Colors 2021 and how to apply it in your projects.
